revtext: Came across wigomania online...shopped for a wig for my sister who is undergoing chemo..a lovely small and cute one..she has been receiving so many compliments ever since the staff was so friendly and helpful especially aisha.. .thank u so much …
revreply: Hey. Thanks very much, Lalita for your compliment. I am sure Janiz Aysha will be elated to be appreciated like this.
